name: @rederly/backend-validations
description: A validation module for backend routes. Used as a glue between frontend and backend.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run generators && tsc && npm run post:build
scripts.generators: npm run generate:route-map && npm run generate:schema-types && npm run generate:validated-types && npm run generate:api-spec && npm run generate:route-indexes && npm run try-validations
scripts.compile:api-docs: npm install --prefix api-docs-generator && npm run build --prefix api-docs-generator
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run build:watch" "npm install --prefix api-docs-generator && npm start --prefix api-docs-generator"

author: Rederly
